collectionSummary.din: Bag DIN or Apheresis Bag identifier
collectionSummary.endTime: End time (24H): Completion of apheresis procedure at end of rinseback

verifyShipper.title: Verify Shipper
verifyShipper.scanCoi: Scan or enter the COI Number found on the packing insert

shipmentReceiptChecklist.title: Shipment Receipt Checklist
shipmentReceiptChecklist.scanOrEnterDescription: Scan or enter the DIN/SEC-DIS or Apheresis bag identifier.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.scanOrEnterDin: Scan or enter the DIN or Apheresis bag identifier.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.listSerialNumber: List the serial number of the temperature monitoring device (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
shipmentReceiptChecklist.listSecuritySealNumber: List the security seal number on the shipper (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
shipmentReceiptChecklist.additionalComments: Please enter additional comments about the receipt. (Optional)
shipmentReceiptChecklist.tempratureQuestion: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8C) during transit, contact Janssen immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.tempratureQuestionCcDcQr: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8째C) during transit, contact Janssen immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.aphQuestion: Is the apheresis bag inside the shipper in the expected condition (e.g. no bag damage, label adhered)? If the apheresis bag is damaged or not in expected condition, please refer to the Janssen Shipping Instructions for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.coldShipperQuestion: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)
shipmentReceiptChecklist.coldShipperQuestionCcDcQr: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8째C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)
shipmentReceiptChecklist.aphBagTransferred: Apheresis bag transferred to cell processing lab
shipmentReceiptChecklist.tempratureQuestion2: Does the downloaded temperature data from the temperature monitoring device conform to the Janssen shipping profile? If there is an unexpected spike and the temperature goes out-of-range (2-8C) during transit, contact Janssen immediately for further instructions.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.coldShipperQuestion2: Will the apheresis bag be kept in the cold shipper until time of cryopreservation? If not, please record the 2-8째C storage unit the apheresis bag is kept in until time of cryopreservation. (If not applicable, select NO and then enter "N/A" in comments box under question)

transferProductToShipper.title: Transfer Product To Shipper
transferProductToShipper.removeCassetteDescription: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 packing insert to capture the timestamp of this step.
transferProductToShipper.importantDescription: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette with frozen bag with care and maintain control at all times.
transferProductToShipper.cassetteLabel: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier on the cassette label (Bag 1)
transferProductToShipper.ln2_packing_insert: Scan or enter the COI number on the  LN2 packing insert.
transferProductToShipper.ln2_packing_insert_emea: Scan or enter the COI number found on the Packing insert
transferProductToShipper.caseIntact: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen.
transferProductToShipper.caseIntact_cc_cilta: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator.
transferProductToShipper.caseIntact_emea_cc: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen.
transferProductToShipper.caseIntact_emea_cc_dc_qr: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen.
transferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given
transferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range_emea_cc: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given
transferProductToShipper.temp_out_of_range_emea_cc_dc_qr: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.
transferProductToShipper.ambient_temperature_exposure: Confirm cryopreserved apheresis product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes
transferProductToShipper.red_wire_temper_seal: Is the red wire tamper seal labeled "RACK" in place on the cassette rack?
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiFromPackingInsert: Scan or enter the COI number on the packing insert.

shipmentChecklist.title: Shipment Checklist
shipmentChecklist.airwaybillNumber: Please enter air waybill number for shipment.
shipmentChecklist.evoNumber: Please enter the last 4 digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid
shipmentChecklist.tamperSealNumber: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid.
shipmentChecklist.additionalComments: Please enter additional comments about the shipment.
shipmentChecklist.evoQuestion: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shipmentChecklist.red_wire_tamper_seal_question: Is the red wire tamper seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
shipmentChecklist.tamper_seal_number_question: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shipmentChecklist.packing_insert_question: Is the packing insert(s) included with the shipper?
shipmentChecklist.consignee_kit_pouch_question: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
shipmentChecklist.comments: Please enter additional comments about the shipment. (Optional)

cryopreservationShippingSummary.dateAndTimeCryopreservedApheresisProduct: Date and Time Cryopreserved Apheresis Product cassette removed from cell lab LN2 storage (24-hour clock)
Date and Time Cryopreserved Apheresis Product cassette removed from cell lab LN2 storage (24-hour clock)
cryopreservationShippingSummary.dateBagIdentifiedToBeShipped: Date Bag Identified to be Shipped
cryopreservationShippingSummary.importantDescription: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified.
